Package com.api.hub.ai.starter

Annotation Interface Agent

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface Agent
Annotation to mark and configure methods as AI agent tasks within the AI-Agent framework.

Methods annotated with @Agent are recognized by the framework and are used to define agent behavior through metadata encapsulated in AgentDefination.

This annotation enables specification of:

  • variables: Specifies the variable handler class or context used by the agent method, defaulting to "SimpleCacheHandler".
  • description: Provides a human-readable description of the agent method’s purpose or behavior.
  • goals: Defines a list of goals or objectives the agent method aims to accomplish.
  • agentPools: Specifies one or more pools or groups the agent belongs to for logical categorization or execution management.

The annotated method is expected to accept a single parameter of type State, which encapsulates the current task, environment state, input-output handler, and history relevant to the agent’s execution context.

See Also:
  • State
  • AgentDefination
  • AiAgent

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String[]
    agentPools
    Pools or groups to which this agent belongs for categorization or scheduling.
    String
    description
    A brief description of what the agent method does or its role.
    String[]
    goals
    Goals or objectives this agent method is intended to achieve.
    String
    variables
    Specifies the cache bean name specific to that particular agent.

  • Element Details

    • variables

      String variables
      Specifies the cache bean name specific to that particular agent. This should correspond to a cache bean configured in the application context, used to manage the agent’s variable state.
      Returns:
      the cache bean name
      Default:
      "SimpleCacheHandler"

    • description

      String description
      A brief description of what the agent method does or its role.
      Returns:
      description of the agent method
      Default:
      ""

    • goals

      String[] goals
      Goals or objectives this agent method is intended to achieve.
      Returns:
      array of goal strings
      Default:
      {}

    • agentPools

      String[] agentPools
      Pools or groups to which this agent belongs for categorization or scheduling.
      Returns:
      array of agent pool names
      Default:
      {}
